statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 12 \\ -9 \\ 15 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -18 \\ 9 \\ -21 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 12 \\ -9 \\ 15 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -18 \\ 9 \\ -21 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
